API.name: IP Geolocation API
API.description: Provides IP-based geolocation details using ipapi. Useful for determining the geographic location of an IP address.

API.name: OpenCage Data API
API.description: Geocoding addresses using OpenCage Data. Converts location names into coordinates and vice versa.

API.name: Weather API
API.description: Retrieve current weather data, including forecasts and conditions.

API.name: NASA APOD API
API.description: Provides the Astronomy Picture of the Day along with a brief explanation, sourced from NASA.

API.name: IPStack API
API.description: Offers IP-based geolocation details using ipstack. Useful for mapping and location-based services.
